team.title: Senior Full Stack Javascript Engineer
team.name: Gabriel Fiel
team.bioHtml: Worked at Pay with Bolt, PlayON/Formula 1, BidRecruit. Experience with AngularJS, API, EmberJS, Laravel, PHP, CSS, Bootstrap, HTML

jobs.title: Business Development Executive
jobs.description:
Based in London

Business Development Executive

Come and work for a startup making phenomenal payments technology for SaaS companies. We're also the ambassadors for SaaStock London, running and attending many events across the world.
We're a startup who are seeing good product traction and we're now looking to move the business into the next big phase. We need a dedicated business development executive to help take us there. These are exciting times. 
What you’ll be doing:
For the first 3 months, we will train you and release you to work with our lead generation team to undertake initial calls with prospective customers. You’ll be assessing the customer fit and booking demos for senior sales staff. You will gain a strong understanding of the full sales cycle, the relevant parts of the product and the market.
Based in Hammersmith, London you will get to enjoy the beautiful offices and the bar on the 13th floor overlooking the river Thames. 
Ideal skills:
— Degree holder
— CRM experience
— Junior sales experience
— Experience of SaaS
— Positive, energetic and driven by achieving personal and company/team success
— Interest in new technologies and concepts relating to them
 
Benefits are: Small team, Free beer, Free gym, Free relevant local events to build our community and your skillset.
 
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: £25k

jobs.title: Growth Marketing Executive
jobs.description:
Immediate start.

1+ yrs experience.

Will work with team to undertake ABM approach to nurture existing pipeleine and new outbound via email and social channels.

Fast learner, experienced with toolset required.

London based, but obviously at the moment remote. Future office based role.
